thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Purchased Arctic Kiwi combo. Plants were packaged well and looked very healthy upon arrival. Built a trellis just for these plants. They went into my new garden on 3-1-17. Then we had those nights in the low 20's. I was a little concerned the plants may not recover. It's 3-27-17 and the plants are sprouting new buds on the vines. A testament to how they earned their name, Arctic Kiwi. Would recommend to anyone interested in growing Kiwi, in Georgia.
